vocabularies.example:
School starts at seven o’clock.
I wake up at seven o’clock.
Dinner is at seven o’clock.

We have lunch at half past twelve.
It is now half past twelve.
The bus leaves at half past twelve.

The party ended at midnight.
Cinderella left at midnight.
It is dark at midnight.

The sun is high at midday.
We eat lunch at midday.
It is hot at midday.

They dance to the music.
Can you dance?
We like to dance at parties.

Don't shout in the library.
He shouted my name.
Please do not shout.

The clowns make us laugh.
She laughed at the joke.
It is good to laugh.

Can you jump high?
The cat jumped onto the wall.
I jump over the puddle.

I could hop on one leg when I was four.
Rabbits hop in the field.
Can you hop on your left foot?

She likes to skip in the playground.
I can skip with a rope.
We skip to school.

We dress up for the party.
I like to dress up as a pirate.
They dress up in funny clothes.

Monkeys climb trees very well.
Don't climb that wall.
He climbed the ladder.

Try to catch the ball.
He caught the train.
Can you catch me?

grammars.description: Ôn tập các từ để hỏi: how, what, when, where, which, who, why.
grammars.example:
Which country are we in?
Why are you running?
What time do they have lunch?

grammars.description: Diễn tả khả năng làm gì đó trong quá khứ.
grammars.example:
I could hop on one leg when I was four.
She could read when she was five.
They couldn't swim when they were young.

vocabularies.example:
Grandma drinks a cup of tea.
Do you like tea?
I want some tea.

Dad likes hot coffee.
This coffee is strong.
She drinks coffee with milk.

I want a strawberry milkshake.
This chocolate milkshake is good.
Can I have a banana milkshake?

Pass me the tomato sauce.
I like chocolate sauce on ice cream.
The sauce is spicy.

I have cereal for breakfast.
Do you put milk in your cereal?
This box of cereal is new.

We ate a bowl of noodles.
Chicken noodles are yummy.
She cooks noodles for lunch.

She made a delicious pancake.
I like lemon on my pancake.
We had pancakes for breakfast.

These strawberries are sweet.
I like strawberries and cream.
Red strawberries are in the garden.

Yoghurt is good for you.
I eat strawberry yoghurt.
Do you want some yoghurt?

A glass of milk.
Please give me a glass of water.
The glass is full.

A cup of tea.
I broke the cup.
Would you like a cup of coffee?

A bottle of water.
The baby has a bottle.
Open the bottle please.

A bowl of soup.
Put the fruit in the bowl.
I ate a bowl of rice.

vocabularies.meaning: đã lái xe (quá khứ của drive)
vocabularies.example:
Yesterday we drove to town.
My dad drove the car.
She drove to the beach.

vocabularies.meaning: đã nhìn thấy (quá khứ của see)
vocabularies.example:
We saw the place where May grew up.
I saw a bird in the tree.
He saw his friend yesterday.

The teacher taught us a song.
My dad taught me to swim.
She taught English last year.

grammars.description: Mệnh đề quan hệ xác định sử dụng who, which, where để làm rõ đối tượng.
grammars.example:
Can you see the woman who is cooking in the kitchen?
This is the town where I lived.
They’re the mountains which I climbed with my father.

grammars.description: Sử dụng thì quá khứ đơn kết hợp với 'when' để kể chuỗi sự việc.
grammars.example:
When we finished lunch we went to the funfair.
When the bus arrived we all got on it.
We were sad when the bus came to take us home.

vocabularies.example:
Put your hand on your shoulder.
My shoulder hurts.
She carried the bag on her shoulder.

Giraffes have long necks.
My neck is cold.
She wears a scarf around her neck.

My stomach is full.
He has a big stomach.
The food goes into your stomach.

He pointed his finger at the map.
I have ten fingers.
She cut her finger.

I hurt my knee when I fell.
Bend your knees.
The baby is on my knee.

Wiggle your toes.
I stubbed my toe.
He has big toes.

Don't put your elbows on the table.
My elbow is itchy.
He hurt his elbow playing tennis.

He carried the bag on his back.
My back hurts.
Lie on your back.

The nurse put a bandage on his arm.
I need a bandage for my cut.
He has a white bandage.

He has a loud cough.
She has a bad cough.
Cover your mouth when you cough.

She has a high temperature.
The doctor checked my temperature.
I have a temperature today.

Ice cream is good for a sore throat.
My sore throat hurts when I talk.
He has a cold and a sore throat.

Grandpa has backache.
My dad got backache yesterday.
Yoga is good for backache.

Don't eat too much or you'll get a stomach-ache.
I have a stomach-ache.
She stayed home because of a stomach-ache.

grammars.structure: Review of comparative and superlative adjectives
grammars.description: Ôn tập so sánh hơn và so sánh nhất của tính từ.
grammars.example:
Jenny is taller than you.
Ivan is the strongest man here.
This book is more interesting than that one.

I’m not as strong as you.
The Nile isn't as big as the Amazon River.
Is it as high as Everest?

grammars.description: Cấu trúc muốn hoặc cần làm gì.
grammars.example:
I want to go to the party.
You need to drink water.
She wants to buy a new dress.

vocabularies.example:
The moon is bright tonight.
There is a full moon.
The moon goes round the earth.

There are no clouds in the sky.
The sky is blue.
Birds fly in the sky.

Look at that shining star.
There are millions of stars.
The star is very far away.

We swam near the waterfall.
The waterfall is loud.
Water falls down the waterfall.

Many animals live in the jungle.
The jungle is green.
We walked in the jungle.

Water the plant every day.
This plant has red flowers.
Don't step on the plant.

The surfer rode the big wave.
The waves are high today.
We jumped over the waves.

It's the highest mountain in the world.
We live in a big world.
She wants to travel the world.

They sailed to a desert island.
We live on an island.
The island has nice beaches.

grammars.description: Trạng từ chỉ cách thức (well, badly, loudly, quietly, quickly, slowly...).
grammars.example:
Please speak quietly.
He runs quickly.
She sings beautifully.

grammars.description: So sánh hơn đối với trạng từ.
grammars.example:
Bears can run more quickly than monkeys.
Monkeys can climb better than tigers.
Elephants can move faster than snakes.

vocabularies.example:
The king wears a gold crown.
She has a gold ring.
The medal is gold.

She has silver wings.
The car is silver.
I have a silver coin.

He wears a bright orange shirt.
The light is very bright.
She likes bright colours.

Light blue is my favorite color.
This bag is very light.
I need a light jacket.

It's getting dark outside.
He has dark hair.
The room is dark.

Zebras are striped animals.
He wore a striped tie.
The flag is striped.

The clown has spotted trousers.
I saw a spotted dog.
Her dress is spotted.

Birds have wings to fly.
The fairy has wings.
The plane has big wings.

This box is made of card.
We use card to make masks.
Draw on the card.

The scissors are made of metal.
Gold is a metal.
The gate is metal.

Be careful, it's made of glass.
The window is glass.
Drink from a glass.

This bottle is made of plastic.
Toys are often plastic.
Don't burn plastic.

My scarf is made of wool.
Sheep give us wool.
This jumper is wool.

The table is made of wood.
We burn wood for fire.
The door is wood.

grammars.description: Hỏi và trả lời về chất liệu của vật.
grammars.example:
What's it made of?
It's made of gold.
They're made of paper.

grammars.structure: shall, could and let's for suggestions
grammars.description: Sử dụng Shall, Could, Let's để đưa ra lời đề nghị.
grammars.example:
Shall we design some props?
We could use blue paper.
Let's design the sea.

vocabularies.example:
We learn about maps in geography.
I like geography class.
Geography is interesting.

History tells us about the past.
We study Romans in history.
Do you like history?

I play sports on Tuesdays.
Football is a sport.
We do sports outside.

Maths is about numbers.
I am good at maths.
We have a maths test.

We do experiments in science.
Science explains the world.
I love science class.

We use computers in IT.
IT stands for Information Technology.
We learn coding in IT.

I love painting in art class.
She is good at art.
We draw in art.

I've got a new laptop.
Open your laptop.
My laptop is slow.

My phone has many apps.
Download this app.
Games are apps too.

I read an e-book on my tablet.
Do you like e-books?
This e-book is free.

Is there wifi in the cafe?
The wifi is fast.
Connect to the wifi.

Put your books in your rucksack.
My rucksack is heavy.
I lost my rucksack.

Look up the word in the dictionary.
Use a dictionary to check spelling.
This is a big dictionary.

Throw the paper in the bin.
The bin is full.
Where is the bin?

Use scissors to cut the paper.
The scissors are sharp.
Pass me the scissors.

Stick it with glue.
I need some glue.
The glue is sticky.

grammars.description: Đưa ra lời khuyên nên hoặc không nên làm gì.
grammars.example:
You should listen to your teacher.
You shouldn't talk when your teacher's giving the lesson.
Should you copy in exams? No, you shouldn't.

grammars.description: Diễn tả sự giỏi về một môn học hoặc hoạt động nào đó.
grammars.example:
I'm good at maths.
Are you good at drawing?
He isn't very good at sports.

vocabularies.example:
The waiter brought our food.
He works as a waiter.
The waiter was polite.

He wants to be a famous actor.
The actor is in a movie.
She is a good actor.

The cook makes delicious meals.
My dad is a cook.
The cook is in the kitchen.

The bus driver drives carefully.
My uncle is a driver.
Be a safe driver.

A journalist writes news stories.
The journalist interviewed him.
She wants to be a journalist.

The photographer took a photo.
He is a wildlife photographer.
The photographer has a camera.

The artist painted a picture.
She is a talented artist.
Picasso was an artist.

She is a fashion designer.
The designer made this dress.
He wants to be a game designer.

The singer has a beautiful voice.
She is a pop singer.
The singer is on stage.

This book is very interesting.
The story is interesting.
He is an interesting person.

She is kind to animals.
Be kind to your friends.
Thank you, you are very kind.

Our new neighbours are friendly.
The dog is friendly.
She gave a friendly smile.

He is a clever boy.
That is a clever idea.
She is clever at maths.

Don't be lazy.
He is too lazy to walk.
The cat is lazy.

Firefighters are very brave.
She was brave at the dentist.
Be brave and try it.

grammars.description: Câu điều kiện loại 0 nói về những kết quả luôn đúng.
grammars.example:
When you dance, you look in the mirror.
If you win, you get a big prize.
If William wins, he wants to buy a fantastic new camera.

grammars.description: Phân biệt giữa hỏi về ngoại hình (look like) và tính cách (be like).
grammars.example:
What does your grandad look like?
He's very tall and he's got short, grey hair.
What's your uncle like? He's very friendly.

vocabularies.example:
Turn left.
The shop is on the left.
Look left and right.

Turn right.
Raise your right hand.
It is on the right side.

Go straight on.
Walk straight on for two minutes.
Don't turn, go straight on.

We're going to the airport.
The plane is at the airport.
The airport is busy.

I need to go to the bank.
The bank opens at nine.
He works in a bank.

He saved his money.
I have no money.
Money is in the bank.

Buy stamps at the post office.
Where is the post office?
I mailed a letter at the post office.

Put a stamp on the letter.
I collect stamps.
This stamp is from China.

We need medicine from the chemist's.
The chemist's is closed.
Go to the chemist's for aspirin.

We watched a play at the theatre.
The theatre is old.
They act in the theatre.

The museum has old objects.
We visited the history museum.
The museum is free.

We stayed in a nice hotel.
The hotel has a pool.
This is a big hotel.

Let's eat at a restaurant.
The restaurant serves pasta.
Is there a restaurant nearby?

grammars.description: Diễn tả dự định trong tương lai hoặc dự đoán.
grammars.example:
I'm going to take my umbrella.
It isn't going to rain.
What are we going to see first?

grammars.description: Giới từ chỉ sự chuyển động: across, into, out of, over, past, round, through.
grammars.example:
We walked through the park.
Go across the bridge.
He went into the house.

vocabularies.example:
The elephant is huge.
There is a huge building.
The hole is huge.

The city is very noisy.
Don't be noisy.
The car is noisy.

I saw a strange animal.
It makes a strange sound.
That is a strange hat.

The food was excellent.
You did an excellent job.
This book is excellent.

Today is a special day.
I have a special gift.
She is a special friend.

The weather was horrible.
That smell is horrible.
I had a horrible dream.

Use a compass to find the way.
The compass points North.
We lost our compass.

Pack your suitcase.
My suitcase is heavy.
Open the suitcase.

We slept in a tent.
Pitch the tent here.
The tent is waterproof.

My sleeping bag is warm.
Roll up the sleeping bag.
Sleep in the sleeping bag.

It's dark, turn on the torch.
I need batteries for the torch.
Shine the torch here.

grammars.description: Mệnh đề thời gian dùng để kể lại trình tự các sự việc trong quá khứ.
grammars.example:
Rose got really wet before I gave her my umbrella.
He ran really fast when Fred came out of the trees.
After we met Grandma's sister in China, we ate the fantastic noodles.

grammars.description: Phân biệt tính từ đuôi -ed (cảm xúc) và -ing (tính chất).
grammars.example:
I was excited because the film was exciting.
This book is boring, I am bored.
She is interested in history, it is interesting.
